metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8911 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An integer underflow has been identified in the unicode_to_utf8() function in tnef 1.4.14. This might lead to invalid write operations, controlled by an attacker.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8911` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tnef - 1.4.9-1+deb8u3build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tnef package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.9-1+deb8u3build0.16.04.1').
